comments.raw_text: I have two windows open with a fair few tabs in them. One of the windows I almost never use, so it's really annoying that that's the window that gets restored first on session restore (blocking the other opening until its tabs have loaded) even though it's days/weeks since I last looked at it. I would hazard a guess that the reason for this is because that window was opened before the window I now tend to use exclusively.
